sources.title: August Week End
sources.description: “”Quietly scandalous” “Dialog bound” (IMDB review quotes) An upper class social drama adapted from Faith Baldwin’s serialized Cosmopolitan story. Paul Harvey and Valerie Hobson head an uneven cast. Adequate production values. IMDB rating 5.1. Directed by Charles Lamont. Released in 1935. Complete print (minus a few missing frames) AKA “Weekend Madness” CAST NOTE: One of Valerie Hobson’s less notable films from her stay in Hollywood.
